Create a virtual reality experience where users can explore a planet made entirely of ice cream. The planet would have different ice cream flavors and textures scattered throughout, and users would have the ability to taste and interact with the ice cream.

Develop a mobile app that allows users to create their own ice cream planet. They can choose different ice cream flavors, textures, and colors to create their own unique planet. The app could also include features such as sharing andg the ice cream planet with others.

Create a planetarium-style experience where users can watch and interact with a planet made entirely of ice cream. The experience would include different ice cream flavors and textures, as well as educational information about the science of ice cream.

Develop a theme park attraction where users can explore a planet made entirely of ice cream. The attraction would include different ice cream flavors and textures, as well as interactive activities such as ice cream tasting and ice cream making.

Create a virtual reality experience where users can explore a planet made entirely of ice cream, but the catch is that the ice cream planet is melting and users must find a way to save it before it's too late. The experience would include different ice cream flavors and textures, as well as challenges and puzzles to help users save the planet.
